Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:32:26
Folder: C10VO2W - resolved major incident - sce11 connectivity issue
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C10VO2W_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-01 20:41
Subject: Resolved: Major Incident - SCE11 Connectivity issue
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please be informed that the SCE11 connectivity issue previously reported has now been resolved.  We identified and addressed an issue and have been monitoring the service for a period of time to ensure it remained stable before declaring the service restored.

 

We will continue looking into the root cause of the issue to identify ways to ensure no further outages impact our business users.

 

 

Issue Summary:

*	Users were unable to connect to SCE11.

 

Business Impact:

*	All B2B and B2C transactions in/out of SCE11  were delayed.
*	Ongoing business operations relying on SCE11 faced disruption.

 

Resolution & Recovery:

*	Transactions have resumed normal flow.
*	RF Scanners are now logging in successfully.
*	Monitoring is in place to ensure stability.
*	Root cause investigation underway.

 

Start Date and Time: Mon 1st Sept 3:54 PM

End Date and Time : Mon 1st Sept 6:17 PM

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.
